thread.title: Kentucky Blue-White Spring Game to air live on SEC Network
thread.title_full: Kentucky Blue-White Spring Game to air live on SEC Network

title: Kentucky Blue-White Spring Game to air live on SEC Network
text:
Kentucky Blue-White Spring Game to air live on SEC Network Kentucky's Blue-White Spring Game will air live on the SEC Network Friday, April 14. Slot to Kentucky Links (Photo: Icon Sportswire, Getty) 
For the second straight year, every SEC Spring Football Game will be televised live on a national network. 
The SEC Networkâ€™s coverage begins with the South Carolina Spring Game on Saturday, April 1 and continues for five consecutive weeks, concluding with the Arkansas Red-White Spring Game Saturday, April 29. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
Kentucky's Blue-White Spring will air Friday, April 14 at 7:30 PM on the SEC Network. It is one of only two Friday games, three night games and four stand-alone games. 
Every game will also be available through connected devices on the ESPN and WatchESPN apps. 
Talent assignments and additional details will be made available next month. 
Vanderbilt will not host a spring game this season.
